name: .wrk
tagline: We implement your ideas into web & mobile reality
description:
PUBLISHING AND MEDIA. Hi, Clutcher! Need a powerful and flexible solution? Our developers can customize the system for almost any project, no matter the size of the audience. 
STARTUPS. Looking for a development partner for your tech startup? Our experience, knowledge, insights and vision let us create prototypes fast, choose technological stack wisely and build perfectly scalable systems.
 
 
Over 180 clients were happy to collaborate with .wrk because of our:
great communication both with non-tech and IT persons
understanding needs of the businesses we work with and always putting client goals first 
respecting the project's budget - no unnecessary tasks, no broken deadlines, no short-sighted solutions
maintaining a wide technology stack and keeping an open mind  about any issue
 
Start improving your online business right now
Tell us your requirement or idea
Start your discovery phase with our technical specialist
Get your proposal and work plan
 
.wrk — your next developer works at our company!
 
 
READ MORE...
